actions.name: AcceptHandshake
actions.description: Grants permission to send a response to the originator of a handshake agreeing to the action proposed by the handshake request

actions.name: AttachPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to attach a policy to a root, an organizational unit, or an individual account

actions.name: CancelHandshake
actions.description: Grants permission to cancel a handshake

actions.name: CloseAccount
actions.description: Grants permission to close an AWS account that is now a part of an Organizations, either created within the organization, or invited to join the organization

actions.name: CreateAccount
actions.description: Grants permission to create an AWS account that is automatically a member of the organization with the credentials that made the request

actions.name: CreateGovCloudAccount
actions.description: Grants permission to create an AWS GovCloud (US) account

actions.name: CreateOrganization
actions.description: Grants permission to create an organization. The account with the credentials that calls the CreateOrganization operation automatically becomes the management account of the new organization

actions.name: CreateOrganizationalUnit
actions.description: Grants permission to create an organizational unit (OU) within a root or parent OU

actions.name: CreatePolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to create a policy that you can attach to a root, an organizational unit (OU), or an individual AWS account

actions.name: DeclineHandshake
actions.description: Grants permission to decline a handshake request. This sets the handshake state to DECLINED and effectively deactivates the request

actions.name: DeleteOrganization
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the organization

actions.name: DeleteOrganizationalUnit
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an organizational unit from a root or another OU

actions.name: DeletePolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a policy from your organization

actions.name: DeregisterDelegatedAdministrator
actions.description: Grants permission to deregister the specified member AWS account as a delegated administrator for the AWS service that is specified by ServicePrincipal

actions.name: DescribeAccount
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve Organizations-related details about the specified account

actions.name: DescribeCreateAccountStatus
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the current status of an asynchronous request to create an account

actions.name: DescribeEffectivePolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the effective policy for an account

actions.name: DescribeHandshake
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve details about a previously requested handshake

actions.name: DescribeOrganization
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieves details about the organization that the calling credentials belong to

actions.name: DescribeOrganizationalUnit
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve details about an organizational unit (OU)

actions.name: DescribePolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieves details about a policy

actions.name: DetachPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to detach a policy from a target root, organizational unit, or account

actions.name: DisableAWSServiceAccess
actions.description: Grants permission to disable integration of an AWS service (the service that is specified by ServicePrincipal) with AWS Organizations

actions.name: DisablePolicyType
actions.description: Grants permission to disable an organization policy type in a root

actions.name: EnableAWSServiceAccess
actions.description: Grants permission to enable integration of an AWS service (the service that is specified by ServicePrincipal) with AWS Organizations

actions.name: EnableAllFeatures
actions.description: Grants permission to start the process to enable all features in an organization, upgrading it from supporting only Consolidated Billing features

actions.name: EnablePolicyType
actions.description: Grants permission to enable a policy type in a root

actions.name: InviteAccountToOrganization
actions.description: Grants permission to send an invitation to another AWS account, asking it to join your organization as a member account

actions.name: LeaveOrganization
actions.description: Grants permission to remove a member account from its parent organization

actions.name: ListAWSServiceAccessForOrganization
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the list of the AWS services for which you enabled integration with your organization

actions.name: ListAccounts
actions.description: Grants permission to list all of the the accounts in the organization

actions.name: ListAccountsForParent
actions.description: Grants permission to list the accounts in an organization that are contained by a root or organizational unit (OU)

actions.name: ListChildren
actions.description: Grants permission to list all of the OUs or accounts that are contained in a parent OU or root

actions.name: ListCreateAccountStatus
actions.description: Grants permission to list the asynchronous account creation requests that are currently being tracked for the organization

actions.name: ListDelegatedAdministrators
actions.description: Grants permission to list the AWS accounts that are designated as delegated administrators in this organization

actions.name: ListDelegatedServicesForAccount
actions.description: Grants permission to list the AWS services for which the specified account is a delegated administrator in this organization

actions.name: ListHandshakesForAccount
actions.description: Grants permission to list all of the handshakes that are associated with an account

actions.name: ListHandshakesForOrganization
actions.description: Grants permission to list the handshakes that are associated with the organization

actions.name: ListOrganizationalUnitsForParent
actions.description: Grants permission to lists all of the organizational units (OUs) in a parent organizational unit or root

actions.name: ListParents
actions.description: Grants permission to list the root or organizational units (OUs) that serve as the immediate parent of a child OU or account

actions.name: ListPolicies
actions.description: Grants permission to list all of the policies in an organization

actions.name: ListPoliciesForTarget
actions.description: Grants permission to list all of the policies that are directly attached to a root, organizational unit (OU), or account

actions.name: ListRoots
actions.description: Grants permission to list all of the roots that are defined in the organization

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to list all tags for the specified resource

actions.name: ListTargetsForPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to list all the roots, OUs, and accounts to which a policy is attached

actions.name: MoveAccount
actions.description: Grants permission to move an account from its current root or OU to another parent root or OU

actions.name: RegisterDelegatedAdministrator
actions.description: Grants permission to register the specified member account to administer the Organizations features of the AWS service that is specified by ServicePrincipal

actions.name: RemoveAccountFromOrganization
actions.description: Grants permission to removes the specified account from the organization

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to add one or more tags to the specified resource

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to remove one or more tags from the specified resource

actions.name: UpdateOrganizationalUnit
actions.description: Grants permission to rename an organizational unit (OU)

actions.name: UpdatePolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to update an existing policy with a new name, description, or content
